page.title: 13MORE LOCAL FARMS
page.content: { LODGE FARM} This is not worked. { { FOREST FARM AND HOME FARM} This tenant farmer has 702 acres which belong to Christchurch College. Forest Farm has 70 acres of horticulture.See "Pick Your Own". The crops are wheat, barley, and oil seed rape. The grassland is used for grazing by beef cattle. It is fully mechanised with storage barns.{ { { FOLLY FARM (BECKLEY)} This farmer owns 200 acres and rents 100 acres from the Buchan Estates. The crops are winter and spring wheat and barley. There is grassland for grazing by beef cattle, making hay and silage. The farm is fully mechanised with storage barns.
